title: Reduction of dinitrogen to ammonium through a magnesium-based electrochemical process at close-to-ambient temperature
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01090F, Communication
Melinda Krebsz, Rebecca Hodgetts, Sam Johnston, Cuong K. Nguyen, Yvonne Hora, Doug R. MacFarlane, Alexandr N Simonov
The Li-mediated nitrogen reduction enables practical synthesis of ammonia, but its energy efficiency is limited by the Li0/+ redox potential. To improve on this, a mediator with a more positive...
